Capt\'n Skunky

Kerbal Comics

Bill and Bob are annoyed at Jeb\'s juvenile reaction.

Jeb, on the other hand... well...

Kerbals who live in glass capsules shouldn\'t throw explosives.

That makes the whole thing kind of... grim, doesn\'t it? Jeb\'s kind of an ass...

And I have to wonder now: were there kerbals in that rocket? That would explain why Bill and Bob look worried rather than annoyed (doesn\'t read as annoyance to me; note the eyebrows).

Also, how are the Koreans suckers? A sucker is someone who gullibly falls for a ruse. Did Jeb trick them somehow?

The more I think about it, the less sense it makes.

And now Jeb\'s acting like an childish jerk, which is really out of character for him.

Jeb can be stupid, he can be reckless, cocky, lazy, etc... but if he doesn\'t mean well and is just an ass, then he\'s not endearing at all.

Think Homer Simpson, or Homestar Runner, or Private Michael J. Caboose. They\'re idiots to be sure, but they\'re not spiteful. They try to be good despite all their faults, and the audience likes them for it.

Jeb is still a very young character, but he\'s the lead, and care needs to be taken when writing him.
